keles yatapath kala nisa.ee keles nawatha mathu wena nisa.widarshanawedi api aramunen sitha bahara karanne naha.kawuru haribaninawa nam ohuge banimen kalambaenne naha.ohuge banima nisa thamange kalambaena hitha saha kaya wenaswena hati dakinawa.thaman wagema banina kenath kalambaila bawa ohuta penenawa.ee wenaskam walata upekshawen innawa.keles nonawathi mathu wenawa.ee upadina keles walata upekshawen inna nisa upadina keles niruddha wenawa.hitha pirisidu wenawa.ee banina athare prathiwadiya wadagath deyak kiyanawa nam ee deta sanwarawa pilithuru denawa.ee pirisidu wimen upadinne samma samadhiya nisa keles mathuwunata dhyanaya bindenne na.mugalan therunta ata kudu wena thuru gahalath dhyanayen pirihune naha.widarshana wadana kenek hasirena aakaraya budun wahanse hamathanama wisthara karala thiyanawa.ee hama thanakama sampajano sathiya thyanawa.keles yatapath karana kenata thamange kayath wedanath adala na.ohu keles nisa kayath wedanath wenaswena widiya dakinne na.kayath wedanath dakkoth ohuge yatapathwena keles mathuwena nisa ohu thama dakinne na.aramuna dakinneth na.hitha shunyawa thaba gannawa.ee shunyathawaya nisa keles yatapath wenawa..keles yatapath wela sitha shunya wenawa.wishama chakrayak magin minisa mohayata pathwenawa.othu thaman rahathwuna kiya hithanawa.anugamikayan hara lokayama ohu puhudun kenek lesa dakinawa..siridhamma uganwana kramayen keles yatapath wenawa pamanayi..ohuta samanya samajaye hasirenna baha.anugamikayo wata karaganne nathuwa thaniyama bas eke gamanak yanna baha.ohu maithrige aahara ganima wiwechanaya karanne ohuge manasika angawikalabhawaya wahagannayi.deranedi amathanne kohomada kiyala chathura ahuwamath ohu kopa wuna.ohu samajaye hasurunoth kunuharupath kiyawewi..budun wahanseth rahathan wahanselath samanya samajaye hasuruna.owunta siduwena kisima dekin samma samadhiya bindune na.
